replies.body: No j4 story this week :(

too many poros to feed {{item:2052}}
Ahhh...Steel Legion Garen. Love using that skin.
Is it worth the buy?

I love it for the lightning effects and that ult. 

But it a matter of YOU liking it, not other people liking it. 

So watch this and decided if you like it: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MvVNWct6rjI
It reminds me of Warhammer or Starcraft, pretty cool.
Foreal. I don't even play Garen, but that skin in particular had me interested. Now that it's on sale, I totally wanna give him a go, lol

Not driven, Draaaaaaaaaven{{champion:119}}

A mysterious force builds as two 4800 IP champs go on sale at once!  What is the meaning of this strange occurrence?  Meanwhile, Draven winds up his axe, forming a fiery crevasse in the ground!  Why does he want to throw it?  Who will get hit?  Will Gnar EVER go on sale?  
Tunin next time to find out right here, on DRAGON BALL ZEEEEEEEEEE!!!

Rito, you should make police officer {{champion:120}} Because ya know he's fast... police cars are fast... so yeah. I'm not really sure what his q would be yet. I thought maybe his w would have special particle fx that look like a siren is blaring around him. His e would have the siren and engine turn on. His ult would make his charge forward with police cars instead of spectral riders. I thought it would be a funny skin and I hope you do too.{{champion:120}} Lyfe
